Package controller.hitKing

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    IHitKingChecker
    Class with this interface can check if a specific figure can hit the king.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractHitKingChecker
    This is the abstract class for checking, if a specific figure can hit the king.
    BishopHitKingChecker
    This class is for checking, if a bishop can hit the king.
    BishopHitKingCheckerTest
    This JUnit test is for the testing of the BishopHitKingChecker class.
    KingHitKingChecker
    This class is for checking, if a king can hit the king.
    KingHitKingCheckerTest
    This JUnit test is for the testing of the KingHitKingChecker class.
    KnightHitKingChecker
    This class is for checking, if a knight can hit the king.
    KnightHitKingCheckerTest
    This JUnit test is for the testing of the KnightHitKingChecker class.
    PawnHitKingChecker
    This class is for checking, if a pawn can hit the king.
    PawnHitKingCheckerTest
    This JUnit test is for the testing of the PawnHitKingChecker class.
    QueenHitKingChecker
    This class is for checking, if a queen can hit the king.
    QueenHitKingCheckerTest
    This JUnit test is for the testing of the QueenHitKingChecker class.
    RookHitKingChecker
    This class is for checking, if a rook can hit the king.
    RookHitKingCheckerTest
    This JUnit test is for the testing of the RookHitKingChecker class.
